short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import thousands of AliExpress reviews within seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
☑️ Amazing review layouts to level up your store design
- LAI review widget is automatically added to your store after installation.
- 6 amazing review layouts (Modern, Dynamic, Minimal, Two-column, Formal, Standard)
- 12 review widget templates for different color swatches (including both Dark mode and Light mode)
- Advanced displaying settings allow you to customize every element of the product review widget to fit your brand: put photo reviews first, edit date & country's flag, change review widget's width without coding...

☑️ Strong social proof and UGC to convert visitors to paying customers
- Helps new stores look reliable and trustworthy by smart review importers. Even new stores can have thousands of reviews in minutes.
- Build trust with authentic customer reviews & photo reviews; After orders are fulfilled, review request emails are automatically sent
- Drive traffic from social channels & Google with social share & Google rich snippets features
- Upsell with coupon emails & review pop-ups

☑️ Other benefits
- Support both live chat and email until you're satisfied.
- Offer partner programs with awesome privileges for developers, experts, and agencies.
- Migrate easily from other review apps to LAI
- No LAI Product Reviews brand mark on any of your pages
